00012     TargetBremFilterMessenger::TargetBremFilterMessenger(TargetBremFilter* filter) :
00013         UserActionPluginMessenger(filter), filter_(filter) {
00014 
00015             bremEnergyThresholdCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "brem_threshold").c_str(), this};
00016             bremEnergyThresholdCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00017                                               G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00018             bremEnergyThresholdCmd_->SetGuidance("Minium energy that the brem electron should have."); 
00019 
00020             killRecoilCmd_ 
00021                 = new G4UIcmdWithoutParameter{std::string(getPath() + "kill_recoil").c_str(), this};
00022             killRecoilCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00023                     G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00024             killRecoilCmd_->SetGuidance("Enable killing of the electron track that produces the brem."); 
00025 
00026 
00027             recoilEnergyThresholdCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "recoil_threshold").c_str(), this};
00028             recoilEnergyThresholdCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00029                                               G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00030             recoilEnergyThresholdCmd_->SetGuidance("Energy threshold that the recoil electron must not exceed."); 
00031 
00032             volumeCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{std::string(getPath() + "volume").c_str(), this};
00033             volumeCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00034                                            G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00035             volumeCmd_->SetGuidance("Volume to apply the filter to.");     
00036     }

00038     TargetBremFilterMessenger::~TargetBremFilterMessenger() {
00039         delete bremEnergyThresholdCmd_;
00040         delete killRecoilCmd_;
00041         delete recoilEnergyThresholdCmd_;
00042         delete volumeCmd_; 
00043     }
00044 
00045     void TargetBremFilterMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValue) {
00046         
00047         if (command == killRecoilCmd_) { 
00048             filter_->setKillRecoilElectron(true); 
00049         } else if (command == volumeCmd_) {
00050             filter_->setVolume(newValue);
00051         } else if (command == recoilEnergyThresholdCmd_)  {
00052             filter_->setRecoilEnergyThreshold(G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValue));
00053         } else if (command == bremEnergyThresholdCmd_) {
00054             filter_->setBremEnergyThreshold(G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValue));
00055         }
00056     }
